Description of incident: The hacking group known as LulzSec published 180 usernames, hashed passwords, plain text passwords, names and email addresses from the organization.  Infragard is a non-profit that attempts to serve as an interface between the private sector, individuals and the FBI.  LulzSec targeted the organization because of its connection to the FBI.UPDATE (6/24/2011): Infragard Connecticut may have also been breached during June.  Lulz Security (LulzSec) claims to have the information for over 1,000 accounts.
